    • Method Detail

      • readVotes

        public void readVotes(java.io.File inFile)
        opens a file and reads its contents, creating instances of the team class for each column of data. The file contains the names of the teams and the votes of each committee member.
        Specified by:
        readVotes in interface CFPManagerInterface
        Parameters:
        inFile - file provided by user. Contains first line of team names, second name of conference names and remaining lines of votes from each committee member

      • selectionSort

        public java.util.ArrayList<CollegeFootballTeam> selectionSort(java.util.ArrayList<CollegeFootballTeam> list)
        sorts the list of teams into ascending order of cumulative votes, lower scores means higher ranking. Compute by utilizing selectionSort method
        Parameters:
        list - ArrayList of CollegeFootballTeam type
        Returns:
        sorted ArrayList of CollegeFootballTeam type

      • rankTeams

        public java.util.ArrayList<CollegeFootballTeam> rankTeams()
        The rankTeams method accesses existing votes for each team, sums the votes, and ranks the teams from lower to higher scores. The teams are placed in a new ArrayList of CollegeFootballTeam type by increasing total score.
        Specified by:
        rankTeams in interface CFPManagerInterface
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of CollegeFootballTeam type sorted with the lowest-voted team first, increasing to the highest-voted (last-ranked) team last.

      • getTeamList

        public java.util.ArrayList<CollegeFootballTeam> getTeamList()
        Get the ArrayList of Teams previously read in.
        Specified by:
        getTeamList in interface CFPManagerInterface
        Returns:
        the current ArrayList of CollegeFootballTeam type of teams read in, and possibly sorted by votes

      • getTeamNames

        public java.lang.String[] getTeamNames()
        retrieves each Team from the ArrayList and puts its team name in an array of Strings
        Returns:
        an array of String with each team name, size of array is 10

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        creates a string with the name of the team name followed by the sum of votes for this team.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the String representation of the team name and corresponding sum of votes
